backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor handling auth, user profiles, and per-user photo storage with upload and listing logic.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining legacy Photo and Actor types and returning the old state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list describing high-level summaries of all major frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base plus custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell containing root div and script entry for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component managing auth flow, profile loading, and conditional display of HomeScreen or SignInScreen.
frontend/src/components/PendingUploadPre: Grid preview of pending uploads with remove and clear-all actions and disabled states.
frontend/src/components/PhotoGrid.tsx: Responsive grid of photo thumbnails that triggers a click handler to open the viewer.
frontend/src/components/PhotoViewer.tsx: Full-screen photo viewer with navigation, deletion, keyboard shortcuts, and responsive UI.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog prompting first-time users to save a name and submit their profile.
frontend/src/components/UploadButton.tsx: Handles file selection, preview, and uploading photos with progress and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, and logout using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, paginated photos, uploading, and deleting photos via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind and defines light/dark theme variables for global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/screens/HomeScreen.tsx: Main app screen showing header, upload button, photo grid, and viewer with pagination and sign-out logic.
frontend/src/screens/SignInScreen.tsx: Displays a sign‑in UI and triggers Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and optionally clean them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, animations, and extra plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, requirements, and known issues for a mobile‑first photo gallery app.
